>
[Healer's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 290 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This kit of bandages, herbs, and suturing tools is necessary for [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) checks to [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54), [Treat Disease](/Actions.aspx?ID=55), [Treat Poison](/Actions.aspx?ID=56), or [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57).  If you wear your healer's tools, you can draw and replace them as part of the action that uses them. 

You can use a set of tools with 1 hand if you're [wearing them](/Rules.aspx?ID=1456) or 2 if you're holding them.
